00040 
00041 const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters RobotSerialManipulator::getJoint(Int i) const 
00042 {
00043 #ifdef DEBUG
00044   if (( i < 1 ) || ( i > getNumberOfJoints() )) {
00045     throw std::out_of_range(Exception("Request for joint out of bounds"));
00046   }
00047 #endif
00048 
00049   return joints(i);
00050 }
00051 
00052 //
00053 // joint parameter setter methods
00054 //
00055 void RobotSerialManipulator::setParameters(const robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters& p) 
00056 { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("unimplemented")); } // !!!implement
00057 
00058 
00059 
00060 void RobotSerialManipulator::setJoint(const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters& j, const Int i) 
00061 {
00062 #ifdef DEBUG
00063   if (( i < 1 ) || ( i > getNumberOfJoints() )) {
00064     throw std::out_of_range(Exception("Request for joint out of bounds"));
00065   }
00066 #endif
00067   joints(i).type = j.type;
00068   joints(i).alpha = j.alpha; 
00069   joints(i).a = j.a;
00070   joints(i).d = j.d;
00071   joints(i).theta = j.theta;
00072 } 
00073 
00074 
00075 std::ostream& robot::operator<<(std::ostream& out, const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters& j) // Output
00076 {
00077   switch(j.type){
00078   case SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Revolute:  
00079     // angles are in radians in JointParameters
00080     out << "Revolute" << ",  " << radToDeg(j.alpha) << ",  " << j.a << ",  " << j.d << ",  "  << "theta";
00081     break;
00082   case SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Prismatic:  
00083     out << "Prismatic" << ",  " << radToDeg(j.alpha) << ",  " << j.a << ",  " << "d  " << ",  "  << radToDeg(j.theta);
00084     break;
00085   }
00086   return out;
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 std::ostream& robot::control::ikor::operator<<(std::ostream& out, const robot::control::ikor::RobotSerialManipulator& rsm) // Output
00091   {
00092     Int numJoints = rsm.getNumberOfJoints();
00093     out << 
00094       "\n" << rsm.className() << " Name: " << rsm.getName() << 
00095       "\n  Number of joints: " << numJoints << "\n";
00096     if (numJoints > 0) {
00097       out << "    joint (type,    alpha, a, d, theta)\n";
00098       for (Int i = 0; i < numJoints; i++) {
00099         out << "      " << (i+1) << "   " <<  rsm.getJoint(i+1) << "\n" ;
00100       }  
00101     }
00102     return out;
00103   }
